description: a mole DJ at a neon rave party
enhancedPrompt: A sleek, anthropomorphic mole DJ, wearing a glowing neon headset and a retro futuristic jacket, stands atop a pulsating dance floor bathed in electric blue and magenta light.

description: a mole surfing on a giant wave at sunset
enhancedPrompt: An intrepid anthropomorphic mole, wearing a retro neon-green wetsuit and a surfboard emblazoned with 'Tunnel Vision,' rides a colossal turquoise wave.
motionPrompt: The mole surfs forward on a massive wave, leaning into the motion. Camera tracks with a low-angle follow shot.

enhancedPrompt: A vast alpine landscape under a sky ablaze with luminous ribbons of emerald green, violet, and magenta aurora. Snow-capped peaks of the Rocky Mountains rise sharply.
A towering holographic blockchain structure ascends into a stormy sky, its glowing BTC insignia pulsing with neon blue and gold light.
motionPrompt: The line graph surges upward rapidly, camera slowly pushes in. Glowing trail follows the graph.

enhancedPrompt: A breathtaking cosmic landscape featuring a swirling nebula of prismatic crystals, refracting neon-blue and violet light across a vast galaxy.
